meanings.definition: The quality or state of being strange or unusual.
meanings.sent1: The queernesses of the old house made it stand out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: She was fascinated by the queernesses of the new art exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The queernesses of the talking dog caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: His eccentric fashion sense added a touch of queernesses to the party.
meanings.sent5: The forest was filled with mysterious queernesses that intrigued the explorers.

meanings.definition: Instances of being strange or unusual.
meanings.sent1: The town was known for its many queernesses that puzzled visitors.
meanings.sent2: The book was full of fantastical queernesses that captured the reader's imagination.
meanings.sent3: The queernesses of the magic trick left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were alive with the vibrant queernesses of street performers.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the natural queernesses of the rare phenomenon.
